exposed ridge.description: There are only two ways off this bare mountain ridge: forward, backward, and a long, long way downward.  Actually, that's three ways.

narrow col.description: A broad path has led you to this passage between two adjacent mountaintops.  Snow from the previous winter remains here.

stone thrones.description: The workers have abandoned this quarry, but someone has built up the leftover stone pieces into thrones that look out from the mountainside.

burned inn.description: A long-ago fire consumed everything in this inn but the stone walls.  Through a door, you see a staircase descending to the lower level.

stone arch.description: A stream runs under this natural arch.  Looking through the opening, you can see where the water disappears at the base of a cliff face.

marsh path.description: Someone laid cut logs to make a path through this marsh, but the dirty water and mud are reclaiming it.  Your boots sink deep into the loose muck.
